Description: Executive Recycling, Inc. and its owner were sentenced for their roles in a fraudulent scheme related to the disposal and exportation of electronic waste to foreign countries. Executive Recycling, the corporation, was sentenced to pay a $4,500,000 fine and serve 3 years on probation.

Agency: Colorado Department of Public Health & Environment
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on October 2, 2020 in response to an open records request.
